Text.Page:
If the plague only killed people, that would almost be a kindness. Instead it turns the survivors into monsters. I'm so afraid I'll be next.

I have a sad task for you, if you're willing. I'd like to see the {@LinkCreature:40#28#selvaras infiltrators}, {@LinkCreature:40#15#mutant workers}, and {@LinkCreature:40#30#mutant tribladers} put out of their misery.

I wouldn't want to live that way, would you?
What you did was a mercy, <PCNAME>. Never forget that.
